name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Happy Timesheet - Spice Up Your D365 Time Tracking

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring a positive and colorful twist to your Dynamics 365 experience with motivational quotes and vibrant styles!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make your time tracking in Microsoft Dynamics 365 a more enjoyable experience! Happy Timesheet is a Chrome extension that adds a splash of positivity and color to your daily tasks by transforming the language and appearance of your timesheet.

What Does This Extension Do?

🔥 Track Your Progress with Streaks: Every day you visit your timesheet (excluding weekends of course!), the streak counter will increase, giving you a visual reminder of your consistent efforts and dedication.

📜 Motivational Daily Quotes: Displays inspiring quotes at the top of your timesheet every day to keep you motivated and focused, making your workday a bit brighter.

🌟 Uplifting Affirmations: Shows encouraging affirmations in the "Total Hours" field, reminding you that you are more than just numbers or statistics.

🗣️ Replaces Hostile Language: Transforms impersonal or intimidating terms like "Resource" and "Timesheet" into friendlier alternatives like "Team Member" and "Time Log." This makes your timesheet feel more personalized and engaging.

🎨 Enhanced Visual Appeal: Adds dynamic animations and colorful effects to create a more enjoyable and less monotonous timesheet experience.

🛠️ Fixes Horizontal Scrolling Bug : Resolves the annoying issue in Dynamics 365 where horizontal scrolling within a timesheet would mistakenly navigate back, ensuring smoother and frustration-free navigation.

Why Install Happy Timesheet?
🚀 Boost Your Morale: Replace bland or hostile language with positive terms and see motivational messages that make time tracking feel less like a chore.

💖 Feel Valued: Our uplifting affirmations remind you that your worth isn’t defined by hours worked or numbers on a page.

📈 Increase Productivity: Staying motivated and engaged can help improve productivity and satisfaction with your daily tasks.

Easy to Use 🖱️: Simple, seamless integration with Microsoft Dynamics 365 without affecting your data or workflow.

Secure and Private 🔒: Operates entirely on the client side. No data is collected, stored, or sent outside your computer. Your data remains secure and private.

How to Use?
Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
Visit your timesheet in Microsoft Dynamics 365.
Enjoy a more positive, colorful, and motivating time-tracking experience!
Join the Happy Timesheet Community!
Transform your workday with a little more joy, inspiration, and a lot less negativity. Install Happy Timesheet today and make time tracking something to look forward to!
